text: (Napiyē) nīr pārkkavillaiyā? Niccayamāka allāh ippūmiyiluḷḷavaṟṟaiyum, avaṉ kaṭṭaḷaiyāl kaṭalil cellum kappalkaḷaiyum uṅkaḷukku vacappaṭuttit tantirukkiṉṟāṉ, taṉ aṉumatiyiṉṟi pūmiyiṉ mītu vāṉam viḻuntu viṭātavāṟu avaṉ taṭuttum koṇṭirukkiṟāṉ. Niccayamāka allāh maṉitarkaḷ mītu mikka irakkamum, aṉpum uḷḷavaṉ
